unnormalised: Aye, weather's a real gamble, isn't it, especially with paddy! Remember last year's drought in Maharashtra around 26/05/2023? Poor Shankar from my village lost half his crop. This erratic monsoon hitting even Kerala on 15/07/2024 isn’t helping. Heard IIT Madras is working on some drought-resistant seeds. Hope something comes of it by 08:00 hrs on 01/01/2025. Jai Kisan!
normalised: Aye, weather's a real gamble, isn't it, especially with paddy! Remember last year's drought in Maharashtra around twenty sixth May two thousand and twenty three? Poor Shankar from my village lost half his crop. This erratic monsoon hitting even Kerala on fifteenth July two thousand and twenty four isn’t helping. Heard I I T Madras is working on some drought-resistant seeds. Hope something comes of it by eight A M on first January two thousand and twenty five. Jai Kisan!
